import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:3000/api';export async function login(email,password){const res=await axios.post(`${API_URL}/users/login`,{email,password});return res.data;}export async function register(name,email,password){// Por defecto, el rol será 'PATIENT' para el portal de pacientes
const res=await axios.post(`${API_URL}/users`,{name,email,password,role:'PATIENT'});return res.data;}export function setToken(token){localStorage.setItem('token',token);}export function getToken(){return localStorage.getItem('token');}export function logout(){localStorage.removeItem('token');}
